text: @LaraLeaTrump @realDonaldTrump Your father in law, his campaign including your husband and the @BOKCenter voided their liability waiver, for the Tulsa rally. The waiver did not cover the Trump Campaign intentionally and purposely creating increased risk for COVID19, by removing DO NOT SIT HERE signs.
